author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In Hong Kong's prosperous port, Prudential fair,
Through index's cap, breathes golden market air.
Results meet expectations, stakes unfurl,
Boding bright growth in the coming years’ whirl.

Eurozone, stout in heart, on a serrate tide,
Where bond yields rise, amid inflation's ride.
Spain and German lands, keen eyes keenly scan,
Their fortunes to tell, ere the ECB's plan.

Glynn draws sight on the southern sphere,
Where Australia's flame of inflation is clear.
Cool winds of rate cuts do blow, he cites, 
As early as '24, in financial night's lights.

feedItems.title: Prudential PLC's Hong Kong-Boosted 1H Lifts Shares
feedItems.description: Prudential shares rose to the top of the FTSE100 index after it posted first-half results slightly ahead of expectations and outlined its growth runway for the 2022-27 period.

feedItems.title: Eurozone Bond Yields Rise Amid Risks of Higher-Than-Expected Inflation Data
feedItems.description: Eurozone government bond yields rose as markets see odds of higher-than-expected inflation in Spain and Germany, key data ahead of the ECB’s mid-September monetary policy meeting, Citi said.

feedItems.title: Glynn's Take: Australia's Cooling Inflation Opens Door to Early 2024 Rate Cuts
feedItems.description: Australia’s inflation readings continue to cool rapidly and should be shifting the conversation to a discussion about the timing of coming interest-rate cuts.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Of chariots oft come the tell of gain,
In great Europa's leafy, trodden terrain.
As umber hares with bounding leaps of joy,
So carriages find growth from shortage's wane.

Whilst Orsted, likened to a aging hound,
Faces a fall on soil of Yank's own ground.
Supply and rate, such nipping dogs of strife,
May cause a bleat of loss, in billions found.

Now Ukraine's drone, a hawk in evening's shroud,
Strikes deep in bear's own land, bold and loud.
And Moscow, stung, sends forth a cloud of wrath,
Like snail-shelled missiles toward the sunlit crowd.

feedItems.title: European Union New Car Sales Rise
feedItems.description: Passenger-car registrations in the EU increased around 15% in July, with all major markets contributing to the overall growth as component shortages eased.

feedItems.title: Orsted Faces Possible Hit on US Assets
feedItems.description: Orsted said it may have to book impairments of up to $2.3 billion on its U.S. portfolio due to supply chain and tax credit issues and higher interest rates.

feedItems.title: Ukrainian Drones Strike Deep Inside Russia, Hitting Military Airfield
feedItems.description: As Kyiv disabled four Russian planes in a strike on the Pskov air base, Moscow launched a missile barrage on the Ukrainian capital.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
In the cavernous heart of Harmony's mine,
Gold doth shine forth with splendid divine,
Forecasts met with high-grade ore,
As gold prices surge evermore.

Prudential profits, rise one might,
In the dawn's early light.
Cuts in costs, asset gains behold,
A tale of riches in billion-fold.

A tempest swirls in EUR/USD trade,
By unclear interest rates we are swayed,
Uncertitude from central banks takes hold,
As the exchange's tale doth unfold.

feedItems.title: Harmony Gold Meets Forecasts
feedItems.description: Harmony Gold Mining reported fiscal 2023 earnings in line with its recent guidance, as it benefited from higher underground recovered grades and improved gold prices.

feedItems.title: Prudential Profit Rises 6%
feedItems.description: Prudential posted an above-forecast operating profit of $1.5 billion in the first half of 2023, helped by lower costs and higher asset-management profits.

feedItems.title: EUR/USD Trade Is Volatile Due to Unclear Interest-Rate Outlook
feedItems.description: Trading in EUR/USD has remained volatile, mainly due to the current lack of clear guidance from central banks on the interest-rate outlook, DZ Bank Research said.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
Hark to the tale of Thompson, Mark!
CNN doth deem he may dispel the dark,
In its halls of news viewed sparse and stark,
New York's once chief set to embark.

Lo, in China where the wisdom tree is swollen,
Yet from its boughs, the fruit is often stolen.
The feeble flame of youth employment, sullen,
Leaves her children burdened and beholden.

Beneath Uncle Sam's sky of endless hue,
U.S. Steel their secrets to a chosen few doth spew.
In bids and bargains, they seek something new,
The future of steel, in whispers, they construe.

feedItems.title: CNN Expected to Tap Mark Thompson as CEO
feedItems.description: The expected hiring of the former New York Times chief comes as the news network looks to reverse a multiyear ratings slump.

feedItems.title: Why Many of China's College Grads Are Becoming 'Full-Time Children'
feedItems.description: A record number of Chinese college students graduated this summer, but landing their dream job may be a long shot. WSJ takes a look at why China’s youth unemployment is at all-time highs.

feedItems.title: U.S. Steel said it has entered into confidentiality agreements with "numerous third parties" and is starting to share due diligence information as it reviews bids for the company or parts of it.
feedItems.description: U.S. Steel said it has entered into confidentiality agreements with “numerous third parties” and is starting to share due diligence information as it reviews bids for the company or parts of it.
